markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 1"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Well-Versed](/Feats.aspx?ID=1634) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Bard" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=19" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 112 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

</column>

---

You're resilient to performative influences that aren't your own. You gain a +1 circumstance bonus to saving throws against effects with the [auditory](/Traits.aspx?ID=16), [illusion](/Traits.aspx?ID=92), [linguistic](/Traits.aspx?ID=101), [sonic](/Traits.aspx?ID=147), or [visual](/Traits.aspx?ID=163) traits.

<title level="2">Well-Versed leads to...</title>
[Educate Allies](/Feats.aspx?ID=1642)
name: Well-Versed
